mainText:
What a sad day. My deepest condolences to the the family of this visionary,
Steve Jobs. My deepest condolences to his friends, colleagues, and all those
he has affected with his work - which is everyone. Thank you, from the
bottom of my heart, for making it so easy for me to send a picture of my
baby niece and nephew to my family all the way in Eastern Europe in less
than a second. Because of you, your vision, your innovation, your genius,
the thousands of miles that once separated me from my family no longer
exist.

You will be missed, but never forgotten, as you have certainly left many
wonderful marks in the world. Rest in Peace.
author: Ivana
